CM8 Doing It Right The First Time

Sources:

Video: Italian HD-Cam-Free
Audio: HQMic
thx m8Ã‚Â´s

Notes:

tried to get a line for this great movie, but 2 weeks have past and nothing, looks like its not coming
the cam audio thats already out isnt even bearable. voices werent understandable, and helicopter noise, first 20mins unwatchable...
finally got a nice HQMic for this movie, all is clear and understandable, no noises, action and effects are good too.
what can you expect from this release is a nice video quality like on fast 7 and audio is even better than on my kingsman release(no phone is ringing-lol)
its def a good watch till a vod or retail comes out

VideoEncode:

Video was already very nice, the usual flicker which i mostly removed - around 90% i would say
couldnt do it completely or video woulda get hurt in the process.
added brightness,sharpness,contrast,smoother,noise filters and added saturation cause it was kinda pale and lowered red colourtone to get a normal skintone
no one likes jaundice people lol :wink:
did around 5 different videos, this is the best of them.
Daylight scenes are more than bright enough, darker scenes are good to watch now too.

AudioEncode:

I played a lot with it, besides the usual cleaning process i played with EQ to get the best out of it,all is fine now
afterwards i synced the audio to my video, ofc everything is lipsync, as usual its not gonna get better than this, unless a line pops up, which i doubt
enjoy

Video: 720x352 @bitrate 1700 2pass
Audio: English HQ Mic Stereo @256
Sample: yes included

PS: there are so many good sources out, but i need good audio for them,
      if you have a good mic audio or even line stereo for the following movies,dont hesitate to contact me
      movies i need audio for are: CHAPPIE,JUPITER ASCENDING;CINDERELLA and LAZARUS Effect
      thx
